## Slide Files (P1)

- [ ] CHK001 Slides live in `presentations/<group>/slides` with `slide-<n>.html` naming

- [ ] CHK003 No external runtime dependencies introduced without review

## Config & Stack (P2/P3)

- [ ] CHK004 `slides.config.json` updated for order, visibility, and metadata

## UX Baseline (P4)

- [ ] CHK007 Keyboard navigation verified (arrows, space, numbers, escape)
